name: Shape Shooter (Shaun Fernandes)
description:
This is my first ever "complete" game,  well i would still like to add new levels and features, but you could say complete.

Its an OFFLINE LOCAL MULTIPLAYER game. Which means you only require a keyboard and a mouse (which is optional).

Well yeah, that's it i guess.

Enjoy.

The Game

2 Players will battle it out in a fast paced game in 1 of the 4 *  levels with portals, lava and moving platforms, randomly.

With guns *  falling from the sky. Each gun has different number of bullets, damage, and knockback.

* MORE TO BE ADDED

Controls Player 1 (RED)

WASD - movement

Left Shift or SPACEBAR - Shooting

Player 2 (BLUE)

Arrow Keys - movement

Right Ctrl or LMouse button - Shooting
